Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-68972 affecting package gnupg2 for versions less than 2.4.9-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-68972 affecting package gnupg2 for versions less than 2.4.9-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package gnupg2 is earlier than 2.4.9-1, affected by CVE-2025-68972
